    35f7cc3 2020-04-14 15:34:11 -0400

    existing items. Display modified state using + for all edit
    settings. Fix the heights for the reply and entry areas to avoid
    distracting height changes with cursor movement. Use original vs
    current buffer content to determine whether content modified and
    apply this to unsaved changes prompt as well as '+'.
